Text:
I LOVE LOVE this..
How do you make remix's like this?
Also.. is there a chance of maybe a longer one for this song.. its just AWSOME!!

thanks redwax! I'm very glad to hear this!
You just gave me motivation to complete this song! I've made this entirely with FL Studio aka Fruity Loops. To sample the sounds I use GoldWave... Thanks again and stay tuned!

I deffinately am staying tuned.
I cant wait to hear a longer version!
During this weekend I am planning to release the full version of this song so tell your friends ;)

YAY!
Thank you.. I cant wait :-)

Here it is! The FINAL version
